author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Examine the contents of 3 types of collections (SimHit, Digi, RecHit) of Hcal to verify the contents

#### PR validation:

Used to test the effect of some corrections of Hcal geometry

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR:

Nothing special
title: Run3-hcx200 dump specific collections
